mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (name, title, content, reg_date, viewCnt, email) VALUES (#{name}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, name, reg_date, viewCnt FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT bno, title, content, name, email FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = now() WHERE bno = #{bno} AND email = #{email}
